actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution congratulating the Government and people of Greece, and the municipal government and people of Athens, on the occasion of the 2,500th anniversary of the establishment of democracy in the city of Athens.

summary.text: Congratulates the Government and people of Greece, and the municipal government and people of Athens, on the 2500th anniversary of the establishment of democracy in the city of Athens.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution congratulating the Government and people of Greece, and the municipal government and people of Athens, on the occasion of the 2,500th anniversary of the establishment of democracy in the city of Athens.
